metadata.title: CVE-2022-4925 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in QUIC in Google Chrome priorto 97.0.4692.71 allowed a remote attacker to perform header splitting viamalicious network traffic. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
